message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $95 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob! I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After reconsidering, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll sell the product to you for $105.
